wikipedia_page.main: Simon Gear (born 2 October 1974) is an English cricketer.  Gear is a right-handed batsman.  He was born at Pembury, Kent.Gear represented the Warwickshire Cricket Board in a single List A match against the Kent Cricket Board in the 2000 NatWest Trophy.  In his only List A match, he scored 27 runs and took a single catch in the field.He currently plays club cricket for Barby Cricket Club.
